Yoga for Seniors

Share

Share on facebookRecommend
Share on emailEmail
Share on printPrint
More Sharing ServicesShare
  • Tuesday, September 17, 2013, 3:30 - 4:30 p.m.
  • Tuesday, September 24, 2013, 3:30 - 4:30 p.m.

Program Locations:

Riverside Library (Map and directions)
Fully accessible to wheelchairs

Join us for a free Yoga class designed for seniors. 

All participants must sign waiver before they join in.

 

Please wear loose, comfortable clothing. Bring a yoga mat or beach towel.

Call or stop by for futher details.

 

 

 

 

More Info

  • Audience: Adults, 50+, Adults

Discover

Picture of the Day

Full-page miniature of gathering grapes, with treading of grapes in background, in September (ca. 1500). NYPL Spencer Collection.

One of 700,000 pictures in the NYPL Digital Gallery

News

Five NYPL Branches Named Finalists In First-Ever Neighborhood Library Awards

September 4, 2013 – Five New York Public Library branches were announced as finalists today in the Charles H. Revson Foundation's first-ever NYC Neighborhood Library Awards, which celebrate the crucial role of local libraries in serving New York City’s diverse communities.

The  Read More ›

Latest Blog Post

Classroom Connections: 'Little Lionhearts,' Young People in African-American Civil Rights Protests (Gr. 6-8)

"I could not move because history had me glued to the seat. It felt like Sojourner Truth's hands were pushing down on one shoulder, and Harriet Tubman's hand pushing down on another shoulder" —Claudette Colvin (Interview on Democracy Now, March 2013) Read More ›
